Extracted Data.Name: Arkala Vishal
Extracted Data.Summary or Objective: Dynamic fresher with Gen AI skills, eager to contribute to SAT Infotech's growth. Confident in my ability to thrive in a fast paced environment and add value for this role

Experience.Title: Industrial Training
Experience.Description: At Anurag College of Engineering, I pursued a diploma in electrical and electronics engineering. Subsequently, I successfully completed my industrial training in the field of Optical Fibre gaining valuable hands on experience and practical knowledge in this specialized area.

Projects: Song Recommendation System: Developed a Python app using Spotify's API for personalized song recommendations, utilizing collaborative and content based filtering. Enhanced the user experience with data visualization to provide insights into the recommendation process

Image Captioning Project: Developed an image captioning model using Vision Transformer (ViT) for feature extraction and LSTM for text generation. Implemented attention mechanisms and greedy search algorithms, evaluated with BLEU metrics on the Flickr 8k dataset.
Smart India Hackathon (SIH): I proposed a mobile app prototype at SIH to enhance tourist's beach experiences and safety by helping them discover and engage in recreational activities.
Certifications: Databases and SQL for Data Science with Python - IBM
Education: Nalla Narasimha Reddy Education Society's Group of Institutions, Computer Science and Engineering Specialization in Data science. | CGPA 7.55 | present 2025
Diploma in Electrical and Electronics Engineering Anurag College of Engineering | CGPA 7.0% | 2019 2022

Recommendations: Improve the **resume format** by using a single-column layout to enhance readability and ensure that it is easily parsed by ATS systems, it is a crucial step in ensuring your application is properly processed.
Consider adding quantifiable achievements to the **work experience** section to demonstrate the impact of your contributions, this would make your resume more appealing to potential employers.

It would be beneficial to include a separate **soft skills** section, highlighting attributes such as communication, teamwork, and problem-solving, these skills are highly valued by employers and showcase your interpersonal abilities.
Although not necessary, consider adding **volunteer experience** to showcase a more well-rounded profile. However, only do so if it is relevant to the job position.

Ensure your **contact details** are clearly visible and up-to-date to facilitate easy communication from potential employers, including professional email address and LinkedIn profile is highly recommended.
The resume should ideally be one page in length, so by removing the **irrelevant information** or redundant content, will help to make the resume more concise and focused.
Consider adding **relevant coursework** if you are a recent graduate to show your grasp on Data Science, it is beneficial in showcasing your academic background and its relevance to the job.

Make sure to remove the **extra spaces** in resume to improve readability and make the resume look cleaner. Check for extra line spacing, indentation, and other irregularities that don't contribute towards the content.
